channel.title: Client help
channel.description: hey guys I know how to portfoward but i use hamachi. with a old source "st0ngscap3" i type that exactly into "network" create it and it works connection to "source cmd" works but im looking into getting a new source reversion 562+ but what would you type in to get that connection? i tried same method as shown on top and it did not connect right and i tried same method with others and same occurrence happened what am i doing wrong? side note:I've been looking for new sources to try if you know any open 562+ sources or even 317 with 702 reversion customs please give links

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @sinner251 sinner251
item.description:
@sinner251 wrote:

hey guys
I know how to portfoward but i use hamachi.
with a old source “st0ngscap3” i type that exactly into “network” create it and it works connection to “source cmd” works
but im looking into getting a new source reversion 562+ but what would you type in to get that connection? i tried same method as shown on top and it did not connect right and i tried same method with others and same occurrence happened what am i doing wrong?
side note:I’ve been looking for new sources to try if you know any open 562+ sources or even 317 with 702 reversion customs please give links

Read full topic
